mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RN FROM (SELECT A.VOTE_ID , A.PRJ_ID , A.VOTE_EMAIL , A.VOTE_START_DATE , A.VOTE_END_DATE , A.VOTE_SUBJECT , A.VOTE_CON , A.VOTE_ANO , A.VOTE_ST , A.VOTE_DEL_FL , B.USER_NM , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VOTE_PART B WHERE A.VOTE_ID = B.VOTE_ID AND B.USER_EMAIL = #{user_email}) VOTE_FL , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VOTE_PART B WHERE A.VOTE_ID = B.VOTE_ID) PART , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROJECT_MEM C WHERE PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID) MAX FROM VOTE A, USERS B WHERE A.PRJ_ID = #{prj_id} AND A.VOTE_EMAIL = B.USER_EMAIL AND A.VOTE_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY VOTE_ID DESC) A ) A WHERE RN >= ((#{page} - 1) * #{pageSize}) + 1 AND RN <= (#{page} * #{pageSize})
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VOTE WHERE VOTE_DEL_FL = 'N' AND PRJ_ID = #{prj_id}
SELECT * FROM VOTE_ITEM WHERE VOTE_ID = #{vote_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY VOTE_ITEM_ID
